Are you sure to add \"%s\" to blacklist？ \nThe following will be cleared automatically. He/She will not follow you,He/She can not sent comment or direct message and @notication to you. The dialogue of the private messages will be deleted.

Method 1.you can find it in the junk mail directories
Please check your email so as to activate your account.
You can use email address for any email provider to sign up
*Please select your service provider\n*send 6-16 numbers,combination as your password:
Sent! Now you can login! The user name is the phone number you used for registration.

Note :
1.Sina doesn't charge for any registration message except the standard SMS fees charged by the telecommunication company.
2.Your phone number provided is only for registration and it will not be shown in your profile.
3.SMS registration is not available for overseas users. However, overseas user can registry through e-mail and speed registration.
Congratulations! You have successfully signed up!
